name: To Validate the JWT
description: This API is used to validate the JWT. Kindly note: if you are using Custom Domain please use the Custom Domain URL in siteurl

Template Params.name: siteurl
Template Params.description: This field contains the LoginRadius IDX/Custom Domain url. E.g., if your LoginRadius app name is company name then the siteurl will be companyname.hub.loginradius.com. If you are using a custom domain for your IDX page, then use custom domain value in place of site URL
